metadata.name: HackTool - NPPSpy Hacktool Usage
metadata.comment: Detects the use of NPPSpy hacktool that stores cleartext passwords of users that logged in to a local file

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 3 AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\\\nppspy.txt')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\\\nppspy.dll'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of NPPSpy hacktool that stores cleartext passwords of users that logged in to a local file
